thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com
thread.title: Helder Rock
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Helder Rock

author: Helder Rock
title: Helder Rock
text: Great quality and massive value considering the cost, however it should come with specific instructions on how to wash as I believe the t shirt must be washed inside out to preserve the printing, nevertheless the quality of printing improved from previous years, great job all together and I already ordered another different T shirt!!!!
